attributes.action: make Ryan air give refunds on flights to spain booked before June 2020
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s the Government who have put the quarantine measures in.
attributes.background: Ryan Air are refusing to give customers who have booked before June a refund or voucher on flights to Spain.

rejection.details:
Require airlines cancel flights to places the FCO has advised against travel to: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333773

Create a fund to reimburse money lost due to covid-19 travel: cancellations: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304912
